title: vdiffr 0.4.0
text: github-release meant help migrate vdiffr 0.3.x vdiffr 1.0.0. 1.0 release vdiffr includes two major changes. switches testthat 3e snapshot management uses updated SVG engine generation snapshots. github-0.4.0 release includes new SVG engine make easy compare cases manage_cases(). intermediate step migration snapshots optional. can also choose update directly 1.0.0 release won’t able compare new snapshots old ones. Note smaller points expected new snapshots bugfix. Following update graphics engine R 4.1.0 causes spurious failures due subtle changes graphics generation, vdiffr snapshots now skipped old versions R. plots still generated versions errors plot drawing detected testthat. SVG generation engine vdiffr updated (@thomasp85). Font sizes now precomputed first 50000 unicode points. allows deterministic computation text box extents without freetype harfbuzz dependencies. Note: main visible change update points now look smaller. Points generated previous SVG engine large. vdiffr now licensed MIT (#95).

title: vdiffr 0.3.0
text: vdiffr now works reliably across platforms: svglite now embedded vdiffr protect updates SVG generation engine. also embeds harfbuzz compute font extents text boxes metrics. makes SVG generation text boxes consisent across platforms. makes vdiffr much robust, also means regenerate testcases new version vdiffr. can expect future releases require updating figures, hopefully every years. Now vdiffr stable engine, next release focus improving Shiny UI.

title: vdiffr 0.3.0
text: Another important change figure mismatches longer reported failures, except tests run locally, Travis, Appveyor, environment Sys.getenv("CI") Sys.getenv("NOT_CRAN") variables set. vdiffr monitoring unit testing tool, shouldn’t cause R CMD check failures CRAN machines. Despite efforts make vdiffr robust reliable across platforms, checking appearance figure still inherently fragile. similar testing errors matching exact error messages: messages susceptible change time. Similarly, appearance plots depends lot upstream code, way margins spacing computed. vdiffr uses special ggplot2 theme change rarely, just many upstream factors cause breakages. reason, figure mismatches necessarily representative actual failures. Visual testing alternative writing unit tests internal data transformations performed creation figure. monitoring tool allows quickly check appearance figures changes time, manually assess whether changes reflect actual problems package. need override default vdiffr behaviour CRAN (recommended) Travis (example run tests particular builds others), set VDIFFR_RUN_TESTS environment variable “true” “false”.

title: vdiffr 0.3.0
text: vdiffr now advises user run manage_cases() figure validated yet (#25). Fixed bug Shiny app prevented SVGs displayed Firefox (@KZARCA, #29). manage_cases() gains options argument passed shiny::shinyApp() (@KZARCA). Shiny app now quit button (@ilarischeinin). New VDIFFR_LOG_PATH environment variable. set, vdiffr pushes diffs failed SVG comparisons file. expect_doppelganger() now takes writer argument. makes easy use vdiffr different SVG engine. See ?write_svg example function. Packages implementing different SVG engine wrap around expect_doppelganger() pass custom writer. write_svg() now exported function. provides template (function arguments return value) SVG writer functions. manage_cases() longer checks orphaned cases filter supplied. (Orphaned cases figures dangling figs folder even though original expect_doppelganger() removed tests.)

title: vdiffr 0.3.0
